metadata.title: CVE-2024-22262 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Applications that use UriComponentsBuilder to parse an externally providedURL (e.g. through a query parameter) AND perform validation checks on thehost of the parsed URL may be vulnerable to a open redirecthttps://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/601.html attack or to a SSRF attackif the URL is used after passing validation checks. This is the same asCVE-2024-22259 https://spring.io/security/cve-2024-22259 and CVE-2024-22243https://spring.io/security/cve-2024-22243 , but with different input.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
